items.name: Blacksmith's Whetstone
mods: Improves the quality of a weapon

items.name: Scroll of Wisdom
mods: Identifies an item

items.name: Chaos Orb
mods: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers

items.name: Veiled Exalted Orb
mods: Removes a random modifier and adds a random Veiled modifier to a rare item

items.name: Veiled Chaos Orb
mods: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers including a random Veiled modifier

items.name: Armourer's Scrap
mods: Improves the quality of an armour

items.name: Mirror of Kalandra
mods: Creates a mirrored copy of an item

items.name: Orb of Alchemy
mods: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item

items.name: Orb of Chance
mods: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity

items.name: Orb of Regret
mods: Grants a passive skill refund point

items.name: Orb of Unmaking
mods: Grants an atlas passive skill refund point

items.name: Orb of Transmutation
mods: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item

items.name: Orb of Alteration
mods: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers

items.name: Orb of Scouring
mods: Removes all modifiers from an item

items.name: Exalted Orb
mods: Augments a rare item with a new random modifier

items.name: Regal Orb
mods: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item

items.name: Orb of Augmentation
mods: Augments a magic item with a new random modifier

items.name: Portal Scroll
mods: Creates a portal to town

items.name: Glassblower's Bauble
mods: Improves the quality of a flask or tincture

items.name: Gemcutter's Prism
mods: Improves the quality of a gem

items.name: Chromatic Orb
mods: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item

items.name: Orb of Fusing
mods: Reforges the links between sockets on an item

items.name: Jeweller's Orb
mods: Reforges the number of sockets on an item

items.name: Divine Orb
mods: Randomises the values of the random modifiers on an item

items.name: Blessed Orb
mods: Randomises the values of the implicit modifiers of an item

items.name: Sacred Orb
mods: Randomises the numeric values of base defences on an armour

items.name: Cartographer's Chisel
mods: Improves the quality of a map

items.name: Maven's Chisel of Procurement
mods:
Improves the quality of a map enhancing Item Rarity
Replaces other quality types

items.name: Maven's Chisel of Proliferation
mods:
Improves the quality of a map enhancing Pack Size
Replaces other quality types

items.name: Maven's Chisel of Divination
mods:
Improves the quality of a map enhancing Divination Cards found
Replaces other quality types

items.name: Maven's Chisel of Scarabs
mods:
Improves the quality of a map enhancing Scarabs found
Replaces other quality types

items.name: Maven's Chisel of Avarice
mods:
Improves the quality of a map enhancing Currency found
Replaces other quality types

items.name: Eternal Orb
mods:
Creates an imprint of an item for later restoration
The imprint can't be applied to Fractured Items

items.name: Imprint
mods:
Restores an imprinted item onto the original
Can't be applied to Fractured Items

items.name: Vaal Orb
mods: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably

items.name: Enchant
mods: Adds an enchantment to an item, or replaces an existing enchantment

items.name: Bestiary Orb
mods: Stores a Beast in an item

items.name: Empty Coffin
mods: Stores a Corpse in an item

items.name: Shaper's Exalted Orb
mods: Adds Shaper influence and a new Shaper modifier to a rare item

items.name: Elder's Exalted Orb
mods: Adds Elder influence and a new Elder modifier to a rare item

items.name: Orb of Remembrance
mods: Randomises the number of Memory Strands on a normal equipment item

items.name: Orb of Unravelling
mods:
Consumes all Memory Strands on an item to attempt to upgrade the tier
of explicit modifiers based on the number of Memory Strands consumed

items.name: Orb of Intention
mods:
Modifies a Memory Influenced Map, causing items found to
have more Memory Strands, but fewer items drop

items.name: Surveyor's Compass
mods: Stores a Sextant Modifier in an item

items.name: Prime Regrading Lens
mods: Change the type of quality of a skill gem with quality to another random quality

items.name: Secondary Regrading Lens
mods: Change the type of quality of a support gem with quality to another random quality

items.name: Tempering Orb
mods:
Adds or replaces an enchantment on a weapon
This may reforge the weapon's sockets

items.name: Tailoring Orb
mods:
Adds or replaces an enchantment on a body armour
This may reforge the body armour's sockets

items.name: Augmentation Implant
mods: Augments a magic Graft with a new random modifier

items.name: Regal Implant
mods: Upgrades a magic Graft to a rare Graft

items.name: Exalted Implant
mods: Augments a rare Graft with a new random modifier

items.name: Unstable Implant
mods: Corrupts a Graft, either destroying it entirely or replacing the implicit with a powerful modifier. This does not replace the Skill the Graft will use.

items.name: Foulborn Orb of Augmentation
mods:
Augments a magic item with a new random modifier with
higher level modifiers being more likely

items.name: Foulborn Regal Orb
mods:
Upgrades a magic item to a rare item with higher level
modifiers being more likely

items.name: Foulborn Exalted Orb
mods:
Augments a rare item with a new random modifier with
higher level modifiers being more likely

items.name: Veiled Scarab
mods: A collection of unknown Scarabs

items.name: Apprentice Cartographer's Seal
mods: Uncompletes a white map on the Atlas

items.name: Journeyman Cartographer's Seal
mods: Uncompletes a yellow or white map on the Atlas

items.name: Master Cartographer's Seal
mods: Uncompletes any map on the Atlas

items.name: Unshaping Orb
mods: Downgrades a map on the Atlas

items.name: Orb of Annulment
mods: Removes a random modifier from an item

items.name: Orb of Binding
mods: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item with up to four linked sockets

items.name: Orb of Horizons
mods: Reforges a map item as another of the same tier

items.name: Harbinger's Orb
mods: Reforges a map item as another of a higher tier

items.name: Engineer's Orb
mods: Improves the quality of a Strongbox

items.name: Infused Engineer's Orb
mods: Greatly improves the quality and rewards of a Strongbox and strengthens its defenders

items.name: Ancient Orb
mods: Reforges a unique equipment as another of the same item class

items.name: Fracturing Orb
mods: Fracture a random modifier on a rare item with at least 4 modifiers, locking it in place

items.name: Time-light Scroll
mods: Upgrades The Flow Untethered to a more powerful version

items.name: Fragmentation Scroll
mods: Upgrades The Fracturing Spinner to a more powerful version

items.name: Deregulation Scroll
mods: Upgrades The Tempest's Binding to a more powerful version

items.name: Electroshock Scroll
mods: Upgrades The Rippling Thoughts to a more powerful version

items.name: Haemocombustion Scroll
mods: Upgrades The Enmity Divine to a more powerful version

items.name: Specularity Scroll
mods: Upgrades The Unshattered Will to a more powerful version

items.name: Facetor's Lens
mods: Adds stored experience to a gem, up to its maximum level

items.name: Magmatic Ore
mods: Adds stored Crucible experience to an item

items.name: Ritual Vessel
mods: Stores the monsters slain for the first time from a completed Ritual Altar for future use

items.name: Lesser Eldritch Ember
mods:
Adds a Lesser Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers

items.name: Greater Eldritch Ember
mods:
Adds a Greater Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers

items.name: Grand Eldritch Ember
mods:
Adds a Grand Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers

items.name: Exceptional Eldritch Ember
mods:
Adds an Exceptional Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers

items.name: Lesser Eldritch Ichor
mods:
Adds a Lesser Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers

items.name: Greater Eldritch Ichor
mods:
Adds a Greater Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers

items.name: Grand Eldritch Ichor
mods:
Adds a Grand Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers

items.name: Exceptional Eldritch Ichor
mods:
Adds an Exceptional Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers

items.name: Orb of Conflict
mods:
Unpredictably raise the strength of one Searing Exarch or Eater of Worlds modifier on an item and lower the strength of another
Lesser modifiers that have their strength lowered will be removed

items.name: Valdo's Puzzle Box
mods: Contains a Mysterious Map with a Foil Unique Reward

items.name: Stacked Deck
mods: A stack of unknown divination cards

items.name: Crusader's Exalted Orb
mods: Adds Crusader influence and a new Crusader modifier to a rare item

items.name: Redeemer's Exalted Orb
mods: Adds Redeemer influence and a new Redeemer modifier to a rare item

items.name: Hunter's Exalted Orb
mods: Adds Hunter influence and a new Hunter modifier to a rare item

items.name: Warlord's Exalted Orb
mods: Adds Warlord influence and a new Warlord modifier to a rare item

items.name: Awakener's Orb
mods:
Destroys an item, applying its influence to another of the same item class
The second item is reforged as a rare item with both influence types and new modifiers

items.name: Rogue's Marker
mods:
Creates a portal to the Rogue Harbour from a Town or Hideout
Used as Currency for services in the Rogue Harbour

items.name: Orb of Dominance
mods:
Removes one Influenced Modifier from an item with at least two Influenced
Modifiers and upgrades another Influenced Modifier
Upgrading a modifier of the highest tier transforms the
modifier into an Elevated Modifier
Attempting to upgrade an Elevated Modifier rerolls its values
Can be used on Body Armours, Boots, Gloves and Helmets

items.name: Enkindling Orb
mods:
Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will improve it
but prevent it from gaining charges during its effect
Replaces any existing enchantment

items.name: Instilling Orb
mods:
Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will cause
it to be used when certain conditions are met
Replaces any existing enchantment

items.name: Tainted Chromatic Orb
mods: Unpredictably reforges the colour of sockets on a corrupted item

items.name: Tainted Orb of Fusing
mods: Unpredictably adds or removes a link to the largest group of linked sockets on a corrupted item

items.name: Tainted Jeweller's Orb
mods: Unpredictably adds or removes a socket on a corrupted item

items.name: Tainted Chaos Orb
mods: Unpredictably either reforges a corrupted rare item with new random modifiers or removes all of its modifiers

items.name: Tainted Exalted Orb
mods: Unpredictably adds or removes a modifier on a corrupted rare item

items.name: Tainted Mythic Orb
mods: Unpredictably either upgrades a corrupted item to unique rarity or destroys it

items.name: Tainted Armourer's Scrap
mods: Randomises the quality of a corrupted armour

items.name: Tainted Blacksmith's Whetstone
mods: Randomises the quality of a corrupted weapon

items.name: Tainted Divine Teardrop
mods: Unpredictably raises or lowers the tier of each modifier on a corrupted rare item

items.name: Eldritch Chaos Orb
mods:
If The Searing Exarch is dominant, reroll prefix modifiers
If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, reroll suffix modifiers

items.name: Eldritch Exalted Orb
mods:
If The Searing Exarch is dominant, add a prefix modifier
If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, add a suffix modifier

items.name: Eldritch Orb of Annulment
mods:
If The Searing Exarch is dominant, remove a prefix modifier
If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, remove a suffix modifier

items.name: Oil Extractor
mods: Destroys an Anointed Item to recover one of the Oils that was used to apply that Anointment

items.name: Power Core
mods: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably

items.name: Transforming Power Core
mods: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably, with a higher chance of a special base type

items.name: Amplifying Power Core
mods: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably, with a higher chance of a upgrading the tier of modifiers

items.name: Augmenting Power Core
mods: Destroys two Sentinels to create a fully-charged Sentinel with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably, with a higher chance of new random modifiers

items.name: Armour Recombinator
mods: Destroys two Armours to create a new Armour with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably

items.name: Weapon Recombinator
mods: Destroys two Weapons or Quivers to create a new Weapon or Quiver with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably

items.name: Jewellery Recombinator
mods: Destroys two Jewellery items to create a new Jewellery item with a combination of their properties. Sometimes, the resultant item is modified unpredictably

items.name: Silver Coin
mods:
Creates a portal to the Halls of the Dead from a Town or Hideout
Used as Currency in the Halls of the Dead to participate in the Trial of the Ancestors

items.name: Hinekora's Lock
mods:
Allows an item to foresee the result of the next Currency item used on it
Modifying the item in any way removes the ability to foresee

items.name: Reflecting Mist
mods:
Unpredictably reflects a rare amulet or ring, breaking it
into two mirrored halves with reflected modifiers

items.name: [DNT - UNUSED] Test Runegraft
mods: +1000 to maximum Life

items.name: [DNT - UNUSED] Arcane Orders Runegraft
mods: [DNT] Your Minions have 15% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate with Spells
[DNT] Your Minions cannot use Attacks

items.name: [DNT - UNUSED] Martial Orders Runegraft
mods: [DNT] Your Minions have 15% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate with Attacks
[DNT] Your Minions cannot cast Spells

items.name: [DNT - UNUSED] Limiting Runegraft
mods: [DNT] Projectiles you create move at your speed

items.name: Djinn-Touched Vaal Orb
mods:
Corrupts a Unique item, modifying it unpredictably
Can Modify Corrupted Items
Items Corrupted this way can have up to 2 Implicit Modifiers

items.name: Fading Reflecting Mist
mods:
Unpredictably reflects a rare amulet or ring, breaking it
into two mirrored halves with reflected modifiers

items.name: Gemcutters Lens
mods:
Changes a Support or Skill Gem into another of the same type
Retains Gem Level, Quality and Experience
